title: Is there a method to remove radiation from the environment in ... - Reddit
body: Accidentally moved polonium contained chamber and now the surrounding 60 blocks are full of radiation. Is there a command to remove it or is my best option to just wait? It was close for me. Just use the auto fill function. /m select Mek and hit tab. then scroll the list. Wait or use the command someone else said.
readable_content:
- IImaginer (2020-12-08): Is there a method to remove radiation from the environment in mekanism?
  - DracoPaladin (2020-12-08): /mek radiation removeAll
    - Plastic-Stop1928 (2020-12-08): hay is there a way to do it legit
      - Altruistic-Status-10 (2020-12-08): thank you
        - servireettueri (2020-12-08): That doesnt work anymore, just says incorrect argument for command
          - Significant-Ad4194 (2020-12-08): Works on 1.18.2, dont know what version of mekanism tho
            - Hazkilla123 (2020-12-08): Wait or use the command someone else said.
              - Hannes1909 (2020-12-08): Additionally - /mek radiation heal *playername*
                - Ok_Specific6881 (2020-12-08): /Mek radiation removeALL
